title: Ferry of Woe
description: Charon is alone in the world. With the death of his closest friend and companion, Charon finds himself in the same dark place he'd been when his parents abandoned him. That is, until a stranger washes up on shore and and Charon finds himself tending to the stranger... who turns out to be one of the deadliest creatures in existence. As if Charon had trouble dealing with people before, now he finds himself dealing with the most dangerous of them, yet he finds his gaze lingering far longer on him...
author: rotxinxpieces
